Graded Assault.name: Graded Assault
Graded Assault.fullText:
Dujun of Erathis Attack 11Graded Assault

Your strike sends the enemy reeling, and it opens the way for a series of attacks from your comrades.

Encounter        Martial, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength vs. Will

Hit: Deal your Strength modifier in damage. Until the start of your next turn, the target is dazed, and any ally within 5 squares of you who attacks the target with an at-will attack power can determine his or her attack result as if the result of the roll was a 10, instead of rolling the die.


Published in Martial Power, page(s) 122.
Graded Assault.flavor: Your strike sends the enemy reeling, and it opens the way for a series of attacks from your comrades.
Graded Assault.onHit: Deal your Strength modifier in damage. Until the start of your next turn, the target is dazed, and any ally within 5 squares of you who attacks the target with an at-will attack power can determine his or her attack result as if the result of the roll was a 10, instead of rolling the die.

Unification Stance.name: Unification Stance
Unification Stance.fullText:
Dujun of Erathis Utility 12Unification Stance

Your very presence, symbolizing the unity of your allies, aids in their recovery.

Daily        Martial, Stance
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: Until the stance ends, at the end of each of your turns, each ally within 5 squares of you can make a saving throw.


Published in Martial Power, page(s) 122.
Unification Stance.flavor: Your very presence, symbolizing the unity of your allies, aids in their recovery.
Unification Stance.effect: Until the stance ends, at the end of each of your turns, each ally within 5 squares of you can make a saving throw.

Diplomacy of Steel.name: Diplomacy of Steel
Diplomacy of Steel.fullText:
Dujun of Erathis Attack 20Diplomacy of Steel

Each of your movements buttresses the impression of overwhelming force and perfect coordination among your allies.

Daily        Martial, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength vs. Will. Gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to the number of allies within 2 squares of you (maximum bonus of +4).

Hit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage.

Effect: After the first attack, you can make a melee basic attack against the target. If the first attack reduced the target to 0 hit points, you instead gain temporary hit points equal to 10 + your Intelligence modifier, and then you can shift 2 squares and make a melee basic attack against another target.


Published in Martial Power, page(s) 122.
Diplomacy of Steel.flavor: Each of your movements buttresses the impression of overwhelming force and perfect coordination among your allies.
Diplomacy of Steel.attack: Strength vs. Will. Gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to the number of allies within 2 squares of you (maximum bonus of +4).
Diplomacy of Steel.effect: After the first attack, you can make a melee basic attack against the target. If the first attack reduced the target to 0 hit points, you instead gain temporary hit points equal to 10 + your Intelligence modifier, and then you can shift 2 squares and make a melee basic attack against another target.
